content: this listing is for an instant download crochet pattern - you will not receive a physical item this crochet pattern is for a baby coat that can be made in 7 sizes from newborn up to 24 months the baby coat is made with bulky yarn making the cardigan chunky and warm perfect as a winter jacket with bunny ears on the hood and basic waist shaping the baby coat looks adorable on baby girls also the crochet baby coat is simply made with minimal sewing you will need to sew some basic shaping plus the bunny ears tail and buttons ⭐️ baby sizes ⭐️ age chest circumference newborn 44cm 0-3 months 48cm 3-6 months 52cm 6-9 months 56cm 9-12 months 60cm 12-18 months 64cm 18-24 months 68cm ⭐️ yarn ⭐️ weight chunky / bulky / #5 brand dreamy wool a pink strawberry ice cream 331 379 431 486 544 605 670 b white marshmallow 13 yd for all sizes total 344 392 444 499 557 618 683 yd gauge - 3″ x 3″ square = 7 row of 8 half_double_crochet ⭐️ supplies you will need ⭐️ - 6 5mm crochet hook or hook to match gauge - bulky / chunky / #5 yarn - tape measure - sewing needle - scissors - stitch markers - 3 x buttons 3cm toggle or 2cm round this pattern is easy skill level the pattern is written in us and uk terminology you will receive 2 files you will need to know basic crochet stitches the baby jacket itself is made in one piece and the ears pockets and buttons are sewn on the crochet pattern is 9 pages long and includes progress photos a free basic online version of this crochet pattern is available on https //hookfully com/ due to the nature of the product no refunds will be issued
